Damage, fire & theft cover.$value: If you have an accident while driving, we’ll pay to fix the damage so you can get back on the road. And if your car is stolen, or it’s damaged by theft or fire, we’ll also repair or replace your car.

Other people's car & property cover.$value: If you have an accident while driving and damage someone else’s car (or their property), we’ll pay to cover the car repair costs and fix the property damage.

Personal accident cover.$value: This covers accidental death and serious injury to anyone travelling in your car, up to £5,000.

Courtesy car.$value: You’ll get a 3-door courtesy car on us when you make a valid claim. You’ll have it for as long as your car is being repaired after an accident, when you use our recommended repairers. If your car has been stolen or written off, you won't recieve a courtesy car with our standard cover, so check out our courtesy car upgrade instead.

Driving other cars cover.$value: You can drive another person’s car if it’s insured, you don’t own it, and you have the owner’s permission to drive it. If there was an accident, we’ll only pay for injury to others, or damage to other cars or property, not for the car you’re driving.

Uninsured driver promise.$value: If an uninsured driver damages your car, you won’t pay an excess and you won’t lose your No Claims Discount (NCD), as long as the incident wasn’t your fault, and you can give us details of the car.

Windscreen cover.$value: Whether it’s a small chip, or a smashed windscreen, we’ve got you covered. We’ll repair or replace your glass windscreen or windows. And, if your paintwork is scratched due to smashed glass, we’ll fix that as well.

Key cover.$value: Get up to £2500 of cover if your keys are lost, damaged or stolen.

Misfuelling cover.$value: Put the wrong fuel in your car? We'll drain, then flush the tank and put new fuel in for you.

Driving abroad cover.$value: 90 days of full cover for you to drive in over 35 countries, so you have a similar cover to what you have in the UK. Silver policies only provide the minimum cover you need by law to use your car in these countries.

Add-on-Legal.$value: Up to £100,000 of legal fees cover, for help with uninsured losses, like missed earnings, after an accident that wasn't your fault.

Add-on-Breakdown.$value: Get up to 1 hour of free labour for roadside repairs or recovery to a local repairer, for anyone using your car. And, you can make up to 7 call outs in a policy year.

Add-on-Protected NCD.$value: Keep your No Claims Discount years safe - even if you're the one who makes a mistake.

Add-on-Courtesy car upgrade.$value: Upgrade from a small 3-door courtesy car,  to one that’s a similar size to your own.

Tier-1 policy due to end.$value: Silver cover is due to end

Tier-2 policy is due to end.$value: Gold cover is due to end

Choose-cover-sub.$value: Choose between our fully-comprehensive cover options.

Add-ons-sub.$value: Build your own personalised cover by adding extra protection. All prices include the cost of credit.

Coversum-No-Add-ons-title.$value: Are you sure you don’t want to personalise your cover?

NCD-subcopy.$value: We may ask for proof of your NCD once you buy, so please make sure your NCD years are correct.

What you'll pay if you make a claim-subc.$value: Excess is the amount you pay when you claim. You might choose a higher excess for cheaper insurance, but remember when you claim you'll need to pay this, so only choose what you'd be happy to pay. Make sure you don't choose an excess level above your car's value; if you do, your policy may not pay out if your car is written off as a result of a claim. More info

Important info-Right to cancel-body.$value: If you cancel before your policy starts we will refund your premium in full.  You have 14 days from the start date of the policy when you can cancel this policy for no fee. If you cancel after 14 days from the start date, there's a £52.50 cancellation fee.  When you cancel your policy, provided you haven't made a claim or had an accident which may lead to a claim, we'll keep your premium for the time you've been covered with us and refund the rest to you. If there's a claim on the policy, you'll need to pay the full premium for the year.

Title-Create account.$value: Let’s create your car insurance account

Marketing-subcopy.$value: We'll send you the latest offers and updates about us and the rest of the AXA family, if you like.

Marketing-subcopy 2.$value: Lloyds Bank would like to keep you up to date about products and offers that you might be interested in. Choose how you want us to contact you below. This won’t affect any information Lloyds Bank have to send to you, such as statements. Privacy Explained explains more about how Lloyds Bank use your data. If you change your mind about how you want us to contact you, you can update your choices at any time. To find out how, refer to the section ‘How to withdraw your consent’ in the full data privacy notice.  We (AXA PLC) collect this information on behalf of Lloyds Bank and you can also contact us to update your choices at any time.

post-subcopy.$value: Get your documents 24/7 in your account, whenever you need them.

Direct Debit Instruction.$value: Please pay Lloyds Bank Motor Insurance Direct Debits from the account detailed in this instruction subject to the safeguards assured by the Direct Debit Guarantee. I understand that this instruction may remain with Lloyds Bank Motor Insurance and, if so, details will be passed electronically to my Bank/Building Society.

Accessible docs format.$value: If you need your documents in braille, audio or large font, just let us know!

UK resident - subcopy.$value: If you live less than nine months per year in the UK, you should choose 'Not resident in UK'.

UK resident (additional driver)- subcopy.$value: If they live for less than nine months per year in the UK, you should choose 'Not resident in UK'.

Accessibility offer-subcopy.$value: Need your docs in braille, audio or large font?  No problem - just fill in the form on our accessibility page

my-quotes.$value: To protect your car with us, go to finish quote.

Account settings-sub.$value: Edit information about your account, email and contact details.

Make a change-sub.$value: Choose an option and follow the steps on screen. We’ll let you know about any price difference, before you confirm the change.

Digital docs-subcopy.$value: You’ve opted for digital documents, which you can download or print at anytime.

Postal docs-subcopy.$value: You’ve opted for your documents to be sent in the post.

Claims checklist 1 - subcopy.$value: Check that everyone involved is safe, or is being safely looked after - including you.

Claims checklist 2 - subcopy.$value: You'll need to let us know what happened and who was involved. Get the details of any other vehicles, passengers and witnesses. If you can, take pictures of the scene and any vehicle damage.

Claims checklist 3 - subcopy.$value: Let us know about the incident as soon as you can, then we’ll look after the rest -from sorting a courtesy car to sending you updates.

Claims checklist 4 - subcopy.$value: Leaving it late to report your claim can affect how much we can help. So, make sure you tell us about the incident as soon as you can.

Make a Claims - subcopy.$value: When the worst happens, we’ll be there to help you every step of the way. Start a new claim and we’ll email you with updates on the progress.

Resume a Claims - subcopy 2.$value: Started to log a claim and want to continue? You can finish a saved incident here. Once you’re done, we’ll email you with updates along the way.

Helphub tile-sub.$value: Need extra support? Check out our Help Hub to find more information and how to contact us.

Settings tile-sub.$value: Change your email address, password, marketing preferences or contact details.

Past Policies-subcopy.$value: You can view any cancelled policies bought from 1 May 2025.

Change marketing pref-sub.$value: Choose how you want to stay in touch with us.

Sub-copy-Need to make a claim?.$value: Make a claim in just a few minutes through our online claims portal - no hassle, no call queues.

Sub-copy-Looking to contact us?.$value: If you need to get in touch, just send us a message and we’ll aim to get back to you within the next working day.

Sub-copy-Looking for a document?.$value: Need your insurance certificate? Or maybe you need to check your policy wording? Get all your documents in a few clicks.

Sub-copy-Need to make a change?.$value: Make quick changes and update your details by logging in and heading to the ‘Make a change’ section - with no admin fees!

Sub-copy-Wondering when to renew?.$value: We’ll remind you when it’s time for your insurance to renew. And when we do, you can accept your renewal and update your details online.
